OOC: My absence has been obvious. Behold my short and crappy post.

BIC:

D=
eemos, Spider, and Arrow were still hanging around the nWo base, ready to b=
e at service when needed...

  ----- Original Message -----
  From: Richard=
 Allen
  To: NBW
  Sent: Wednesday, January 22, 2003 7:48 PM
  Subject: nWo=
 base


  OOC: Ok, no one else in the nWo posted so I guess I'm doing this =
solo right now.

  : : Razor, Diesel, Heartbreak : :

  The armor doors on =
the nWo base open slightly as three members of the nWo emerge from the base=
. As Commander, Razor steps forward.

  Razor: I must say, the service on t=
his planet is excellent. Just when you plan to hunt down some Predacons, th=
ey show up at your door step.

  Razor points his plasma rifle at the Preds=
.

  Razor: Now do you really want to do this, fools?

  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

  The preceding has been paid for by the

  =
New World Order
